snippet.title: Unreal Engine 5 4K Cinematic Cutscene 1 for Paladin's Passage
snippet.description:
This is the first cinematic cutscene made in Unreal Engine 5 in 4K resolution for my upcoming game Paladin's Passage.

Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1908480/Paladins_Passage/
Site: https://paladinspassage.com

Follow Bent Vector Studios:
Twitter: https://twitter.com/bent_vector
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/bentvector

Explore deep beneath the ancient, ruined city of Delphi. Discover secret, magical artifacts that can help save the Roman Empire. Many have ventured forth; None have ever returned. Can you be the first to succeed?

Awesome soundtrack for this cinematic trailer was created by Alexander Nakarada of https://www.serpentsoundstudios.com.

Trailer does not represent in-game play. Custom cinematic created to help introduce the plot for the game.
